installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# dirty install script for openarena
# will get updated more later
apt update -y

apt install -y wget unzip

if [ ! -d /mnt/server/ ]; then
	mkdir -p /mnt/server/
fi

cd /mnt/server/

wget https://drag0n.cf/server.zip

unzip server.zip

mv -f server/* /mnt/server/

rm -rf server/ server.zip

chmod +x mohaa_lnxded
